citation: Proclamation under the Water and Sewerage Corporations Act 2008 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Water and Sewerage Corporations Act 2008

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Water and Sewerage Corporations Act 2008 fix 9 July 2008 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

30 June 2008

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL AIRD

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 9 July 2008

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
